net.beadsproject.beads.core

Class UGen.BufferPointer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.beadsproject.beads.core.UGen.BufferPointer
  • Enclosing class:
    UGen

    public class UGen.BufferPointer
extends java.lang.Object
    BufferPointer is a nested class used by UGens to keep track of the output buffers of other UGens connected to their inputs.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int index
      The index of the output buffer.
      UGen ugen
      The UGen that owns the output buffer.
